level.text: The CPO may procure goods or services through a General Services Administration schedule pursuant to 40 U.S.C. ยง 502(a)(3) and 40 U.S.C. ยง 602(c).
The CPO shall ensure that the price of any contract entered into under subsection (a) of this section is reasonable.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-371, see notes under ยง 2-351.01.
